results.title: Metformin inactivates the cGAS-STING pathway through autophagy and suppresses senescence in nucleus pulposus cells.
results.text_hl: In vivo studies also showed that @CHEMICAL_3_methyladenine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C025946 @@@3-MA@@@ might diminish the therapeutic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@IVDD@@@.

results.title: Metformin ameliorates cardiac conduction delay by regulating microRNA-1 in mice.
results.text_hl: A few therapies and drugs have a good effect on @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@cardiac conduction delay@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) has a protective effect on the heart.

results.title: Metformin decreases LPS-induced inflammatory response in rabbit annulus fibrosus stem/progenitor cells by blocking HMGB1 release
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be used as an efficient treatment for the @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@disc degenerative disease@@@.
